line2: By now you must know of our exciting offering whereby transferring your account you will receive a free UTP, access to more markets and receive greater support from our friends at ETX. Updating today will also enter you into a first trade draw to win £10,000. *
line3: Remember - this offer is only valid until tomorrow
line4: though our support will last a lifetime!
line5: Pipindex and Academy of Financial Trading look forward to continuing to support you!
